Description.en: Cancel the effects of all \fin{} cards this round.
Swap two played \stn{} cards between any two players other than yourself.
Your \stn{} cards cannot be changed by any future \fin{} effects this round.
If you have played a \brgbtr{}, you may take all their held \act{} and \fin{} cards.
If you have played a \btrbrg{}, you may change your stance to a \brg{}, if you are holding one. If you do so, the other player gains 2 extra \pnts{}.
Gain 3 \pnts{} for every time you have played a \btrbtr{} in this round.
Gain 3 \pnts{} for each of your \brgbtr{} in this round.
Replace one of your played \stn{} cards with one of the opposite \stn{}, if you hold one.
Choose another player. Both of you lose 5 \pnts{}. If you are already the player with the lowest score before losing these \pnts{}, only the other player loses 5 \pnts{}.
If more than half the \fin{} cards have already been resolved, gain 3 \pnts{}. Otherwise, lose 1 \pnt{}.
The player of the next \fin{} to resolve loses 4 \pnts{}.
Lose 3 \pnts{}. You may not lose any further \pnts{} this round, for any reason.
Pick up 4 played \stn{} cards, shuffle them, and randomly deal them back to where they were taken from before revealing them.
Take 3 \pnts{} from one player, and give 3 \pnts{} to a player other than yourself.
Choose another player. All other players vote for you, or for the other player. If you win a majority of votes, take 3 \pnts{} from the other player. If you do not, give 3 \pnts{} to them.
If this is the last \fin{} to resolve, gain 5 \pnts{}.
Every player gains 1 \pnt{} for every \brg{} they have played. You gain an extra \pnt{} for each \brg{} you have played.
You may ignore any \pnts{} lost due to any one \btr{}.
Gain 1 \pnt{} for every \brgbtr{} in this round.
Gain 3 \pnts{} and discard all of your \act{} and \fin{} cards.
Ask a player you have played a \btr{} against if they forgive you. If they do, you gain 3 \pnts{}, and they gain 1 \pnt{}.
For each \brgbrg{} you have played, gain 1 \pnt{}, and you may replace any played \btr{} with a \btr{} from your hand.
Select up to 2 pairs of \brgbtr{} and swap them. You may only select 1 interaction per player.
